resources.string: To create a new thought, select the "+" icon at the top of the app. Give your thought a title and then write a draft of what you would like to post. Click save.
To edit a thought, simply tap on the thought to bring up the edit screen. From there, make any changes that you need to and click save.
To delete a thought, swipe right on the thought that you wish to delete.
To approve a thought for posting, long press on the thought and then select OK at the dialogue that appears. A post will appear with a green background once it has been approved.
You can sort/filter the thoughts by selecting an appropriate option from the menu.
